channel.title: Aws on Alex T.
channel.description: Recent content in Aws on Alex T.

item.title: Bringing Maven and AWS CodeArtifact Together
item.description: As a part of migrating our infrastructure fo AWS, we use CodeArtifact for hosting and caching Maven dependencies as well as mirroring the external repositories. Setting up CodeArtifact repositories is not too difficult, but making it work with Maven in a local environemnt is very chalengging due to a lot of AWS security constrains.

item.title: Building Node Canvas Container for AWS Lambda
item.description: The Cairo-backed node-canvas has been a pillar for many Node.js based projects that need to simulate a browser canvas on the server-side. One of our recent projects uses Apache ECharts to render some graphs.
